branchCategory.name: AR20-40, Modular Style Regulator, Epoxy Coated
branchCategory.description: <p class="MsoNormal">The AR20~40-X48 is an epoxy coated version of the standard modular AR series regulator.  The coating provides an economical alternative for extended life in aggressive or washdown environments.</p>
